name: vci-directory-auditor
description: Audit tool for the VCI Issuers Directory

scripts.test: ts-node --files src/assemble.ts -s tests/actual.json -c tests/snapshot1.json -n && ts-node --files src/assemble.ts -s tests/actual.json -c tests/snapshot2.json && ts-node --files src/assemble.ts -s tests/actual.json -c tests/snapshot3.json && diff tests/expected.json tests/actual.json
